Class Prescription

java.lang.Object
entity.EntityObject
entity.medicine.Prescription
public class Prescription extends EntityObject
Represents a prescription linked to an appointment, containing the prescription ID, the associated appointment ID, and the status of the prescription (active or not).

  • Constructor Summary

    • Prescription

      public Prescription(String id, String apptId, boolean isActive)
      Constructor to create a new prescription with specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the prescription.
      apptId - The ID of the associated appointment.
      isActive - Indicates whether the prescription is currently active.
